solarsystems.description: This Solar energy systems are used in a home used by people.
features: A battery to store the energy KWH, A remote energy consumption, A clean sustainable Energy system

solarsystems.description: The Solar system is used in High voltage places especially in factories businesses and large buildings
features: More Solar Panels installed, A remote energy consumption, It has tax incentives, larger batteries and works with big machinery.

solarsystems.description: The solar energy system is used when off-grid.
features: Has a battery storage, no tax incentives, converts much faster within the batteries and has a sustainable energy.
